GK16vcamkc_u:563: śrīsiṅgakṣitipālasaṅgarataleṣvaṅgāni dṛṣṭvā dviṣāmātaṅkena samantataḥ kilakilārāveṇa vaitālikāḥ /
GK16vcamkc_u:564: kāntāḥ khaṇḍavikhṇḍatāṃ parigatānyuccaṇḍakhaḍgāhateḥ ghorāḥ kaṅkakulākuleṣu cakitāśvinvanti minvanti ca // Ckc_2.*16 //

GK16vcamkc_u:2361: atyānatena śirakecchati siṅgabhūpe tanmāninī na vijarāti jahāti bāṣpam // Ckc_7.*79 //
GK16vcamkc_u:2362: atra vakṣasi salilasekaṃ nāyakaḥ śirasi yatsamīhitavān nāyikayā tatśṛṅgasalilaṃ na muktam kintu bāṣpamiti yattadatra nāyakasya hṛdaye kācidanyā hṛdayavallabhaā vasatīti bhāvaḥ /
GK16vcamkc_u:2366: mama hṛdaye sthitāṃ tvāmeva tvaṃ kimiti sektumicchasi /
GK16vcamkc_u:2367: yadi priye māṃ sektumicchasi tarhi śirasi siñceti /
GK16vcamkc_u:2368: tadāparasyā sthitiśaṅkayā na sektavyo 'yamiti yo 'yaṃ nāyikāyāḥ pratīptotkaṇṭhāṃ bodhayatītyarthāpattiriyam /
GK16vcamkc_u:2370: iti sarasasāhityacāturīdhurīṇaviśveśvarakavicandrapraṇītāyāṃ śrī siṅgabhūpālakīrtisudhāsāraśītalāyāṃ camatkāracandrikāyāmalaṅkāraviveko nāma saptamovilāsaḥ //
GK16vcamkc_u:2375: viśiṣṭārthaḥ kavīnāṃ tā ubhayālaṅkṛtayo matāḥ // Ckc_8.1 //
GK16vcamkc_u:2383: pratītaṃ kathitaṃ vā syādarthayorupamā hi sā // Ckc_8.5 //
GK16vcamkc_u:2385: padopamā dvidhā tatra samāsāt pratyayādapi // Ckc_8.6 //
GK16vcamkc_u:2390: bāhau śeṣāhidīrghe jalajakaratale bhāti viśvaṃbhareyaṃ krudhyatkālāhidaṃṣṭrāṃ mukhavikaṭamukhīṃ khaḍgarekhāṃ dadhāne // Ckc_8.*1 //
GK16vcamkc_u:2394: śeṣāhirivadīrghaḥ śeṣāhidīrgha ityatra dyotakārtha upamānāni sāmānyavacanairiti samāsenokta iti seyamantargatadyotakārthā nāma samāsapadopamā
GK16vcamkc_u:2395: jalajamiva tāmraṃ karatalaṃ yasyāyaṃ jalajakaratala ityatrānyapadārthaṃsamāsa evadyotakatulya dhayorantarmarbhūtatvādiyamantarbhūtobhayārthā nāma samāsapadopamā /
GK16vcamkc_u:2401: atra yadyapi rāhuriva rāhuḥ kalpapādapa iva kalpapādapa iti cābhedopacāravyāvṛttyā rāhukalpaśabdayorupamānabhāvinorapyupameye bāhau vṛttiḥ /
GK16vcamkc_u:2402: tābhyāṃ ca yadyapi svārthe eva bahuckalpappratyayau bhavataḥ tathāpi yathā śūrādibhya
GK16vcamkc_u:2404: guṇabhūtamevopamānārthaṃ bruvāte iti seyamupamānār thapratyayā nāma pratyayopamā /
GK16vcamkc_u:2407: pārāvārabirāviṇīṣu vijayaprasthānabherīṣu te kākakrośi kuraṅgadhāvi ca kulaṃ vidveṣiṇāṃ jāyate // Ckc_8.*3 //
GK16vcamkc_u:2408: atra pārāvārā iva rudanti pārāvāravirāviṇya ityatra kartaryupamāna iti sāmānādhikaraṇyena kartavye ca pratyaye upameyārthapratyayā nāma padopamā
GK16vcamkc_u:2413: atra kalyāṇaśailo meruḥ tadvadityatra tatra tasyevitībārthe vatiḥ /
GK16vcamkc_u:2414: recarlasantativadityatra tu tena tulyaṃ kriyā cedvatiṃriti dyotakārtha eva na punastulyakriyārtha iti dyotakārthapratyayā nāma padopamā /
GK16vcamkc_u:2416: uddaṇḍapratigaṇḍhabhairavavibho rajyatkaṭākṣe ruṣā gehīyanti virodhināṃ giriguhā stalpāyate śādvalam /
GK16vcamkc_u:2417: saudhīyanti taṭe ca te kapicamūcāraṃ caranto vane paśyanti prabhudarśamugraśabarāneṇīsutīyanti ca // Ckc_8.*5 //
GK16vcamkc_u:2418: atra gehānīvācaranti gehīyantītyatra kyac pratyaya upamānādācāra iti kriyāviśeṣalakṣaṇe tulyadharmārtha eva samutpanna iti seyaṃ tulyadharmārthapratyayā nāma padopamā /
GK16vcamkc_u:2419: saivādhikaraṇakyacā yathā atra saidha iva ācarati saudhīyantītyatrādhārakyacpratyayo 'pi tulyadharmārtha eveti seyaṃ tādṛśī /
GK16vcamkc_u:2420: saiva kriyayā yathā uddaṇḍapratigaṇjabhairava bhavadbāṇā raṇe vidbiṣāṃ bhetālanti halāhalanti dahanajvālanti kālanti ca /
GK16vcamkc_u:2421: śrīsiṅgakṣitipāla pālitaguṇa tvatkīrtivisphūrtayo nīhāranti haranti nirjaravarāhāranti hāranti ca // Ckc_8.*6 //
GK16vcamkc_u:2422: atra bhetālantītyādiṣu kriyāsu tadivācaratītyācāralakṣaṇatulyadharmārthe kvibuptanna iti seyamapi tulyadharmārthapratyayā nāma padopamā /
GK16vcamkc_u:2424: vākyopamā dvidhā jñeyā tatrādyā dvividhā matā // Ckc_8.10 //
GK16vcamkc_u:2427: yathā rākācandre sakalajagadānandajanane saroje gaure bā surabhitadaśāśāpariṣadi /
GK16vcamkc_u:2428: mahāratnollāsinyurasi danujāreriva ruciṃ parāṃ dhatte siṅgakṣitipa bhavatī śrīratitarām // Ckc_8.*7 //
GK16vcamkc_u:2434: atra tulyadharmasya dhavalimāderanabhidhāne 'pi prasiddhibalenopamānopameyabhāvasya pratīteriyaṃ tulyadharmavatī vākyopamā /
GK16vcamkc_u:2439: tadviśeṣaṇayossamudāyenana ca dvayoḥ sādṛśyaṃ pratīyata itīyaṃ dyotakalopavatī nāma
GK16vcamkc_u:2446: na karpūrā na nīhārā na ca śāradacandrikāḥ /
GK16vcamkc_u:2448: atra tulyadharmadyotakābhyāṃ vināpi nāyakakīrtiṣu karpūrādibhrāntipratyākhyānenaiva tadupamānopameyabhāvapratīteriyamubhayalopavatī nāma padārthasāmyavatī vākyopamā /
GK16vcamkc_u:2458: dyotakaśabdena tayoḥ parasparamupamānopameyabhāvo 'bhihita iti seyamekadyotakā nāma
GK16vcamkc_u:2463: atra vākyadvayaikatāpattikāmanayā kartuḥ karmaṇo 'dhikaraṇāccopamānāt pṛthak pṛthag dyotakaśabdaḥ kṛta iti seyamanekadyotakā nāma vākyārthasāmyavatī vākyopamā /
GK16vcamkc_u:2465: devānāṃ divi rakṣaṇāya maghavā jāgarti daṃbholinā sādhūnāṃ bhūvi siṅgabhūpatirayaṃ khaḍgena śātāsriṇā /
GK16vcamkc_u:2466: ratnādau prathamo mudā viharate rambhādibhirvaibhavā- drājādrāvitaro 'pi ropitayaśāśśuddhāntakāntājanaiḥ // Ckc_8.*13 //
GK16vcamkc_u:2467: atra suranāyakayoḥ svarlokabhūlokayoḥ devabhūdevānāṃ dambholikaravālayośca tulyaikaśriyā
GK16vcamkc_u:2471: avivekī na surabhivaccintāmaṇiriva na yāti kāṭhinyam /
GK16vcamkc_u:2473: atropamānopameyadyotakeṣu stsu yoyamaviveko nāma dharmaḥ so 'yamupamāna eva kavinā niyamyata itīyaṃ vaidharmyavatī nāma vākyopamā /
GK16vcamkc_u:2476: seyaṃ dvedhā hi rūpeṇa prakṛtāprakṛteti ca /
GK16vcamkc_u:2478: ekadeśopamā cānye mālikā mekhaleti ca // Ckc_8.16 //
GK16vcamkc_u:2481: raicarlīyakulendunā svapatinā daityāriṇeva sphuṭaṃ senā sindhuriva prayāti nitarāṃ kenāpi durlaṅghatām // Ckc_8.*15 //
GK16vcamkc_u:2483: yathā mainākādiśailānāṃ mātaṅgādīnāṃ samudrasenādharmāṇāṃ pratītasādṛśyānāṃ pṛthak
GK16vcamkc_u:2485: bhaṅgiḥ seyaṃ sākalyavatī nāma prakṛtirūpā prapañcoktiḥ /
GK16vcamkc_u:2489: atra kalpavṛkṣanāyakayorupamānopameyabhāve vaktavye kalpavṛkṣalakṣaṇamupamānaṃ parityajya tadekadeśena sahopameyaikadeśo bāhuyugalāśaṃsāvayavaiḥ
GK16vcamkc_u:2490: kisalayakusumaissaha bhujayugāṅgānyaṅgulyaḥ nakharucayaśca pṛthak pṛthag dyotakaśabdaprayogādvistareṇopamitānītīyamekadeśavatī nāma prakṛtarūpā prapañcopamā /
GK16vcamkc_u:2492: karpūrairiva kaumudairiva kulaiḥ kāśairiva svarṇadī-kallolairiva kaitakairiva dalaiḥ kādambayūthairiva /
GK16vcamkc_u:2493: śrīgandhairiva śāradairiva ganaiḥ śītāṃśubiṃbairiva vyāptaṃ siṅganarendrakīrtivibhavaiḥ trailokyamālokyate // Ckc_8.*17 //
GK16vcamkc_u:2494: atra nāyakakīrtirekaikaprakarṣapratītaye mālikāprakāreṇa karpūrādibhirupamīyata itīyaṃ mālikā nāma prakṛtarūpā prapañcopamā /
GK16vcamkc_u:2496: prajñeva kīrtiramalā tava siṅgabhūpa prajñāpi khaḍga iva tīvratarā vibhāti /
GK16vcamkc_u:2497: khaḍgaḥ pratāpa iva śātravacittadāhī prāntān diśāṃ bhajati kīrtiriva pratāpaḥ // Ckc_8.*18 //
GK16vcamkc_u:2498: atrābhidhīyamānasādṛsyānāṃ prajñādīnāṃ raśanānyāyena saṃkalayya saprapañcatayā kathanātseyaṃ mekhalā nāma prakṛtarūpā prapañcopamā /
GK16vcamkc_u:2499: uktā vikṛta rūpeti yānyā sāpi caturvidhā /
GK16vcamkc_u:2502: koṇe kutracidāsatāṃ kariṇiki kroḍādayaḥ kecana prācīnāstadupāśrayānvayamamī doṣānna bhāṣāmahe /
GK16vcamkc_u:2503: keyūraṃ smaragasmarasya śayanaṃ śaurergirāṃ śāsitā śrīsiṅgakṣitināyakena samatāṃ śeṣāhirevārhati // Ckc_8.*19 //
GK16vcamkc_u:2504: atra pratīyamāne dharaṇīdhaureyatve śeṣādīnāmupamānatvaṃ nāyakasyopameyatvamiti marvādāyāṃ
GK16vcamkc_u:2505: varṇanīyasyātiśayaṃ vivakṣatā kenāpi vaktā viparyāsādupamānopameyabhāvaḥ kalpita
GK16vcamkc_u:2506: iti seyaṃ viparyāsopamā nāma vikṛtarūpā prapañcopamā /
GK16vcamkc_u:2512: kālāpāṃ yadakalpapādapamahāśākhā samālaṃbate śrīsiṅgakṣitipālabāhuranayā tulyaḥ kṛpāṇojjvalaḥ /
GK16vcamkc_u:2513: hemādrerupari sthite yadi vidhau pāścātyagaurāndhatā tacchatraṃ kṛtaśātakumbhakalaśaṃ jātopamānaṃ bhavet // Ckc_8.*21 //
GK16vcamkc_u:2514: atra kalpapādapaśākhāyāḥ kālāhisaṃkalpamutpādyānayā sakṛpāṇo nāyakapāṇirupamīyata iti seyamutpādyopamā nāma vikṛtarūpā prapañcopamā /
GK16vcamkc_u:2519: atropamānopameyabhāva ekasyaivānanvita itīyamananvayā nāma vikṛtā prapañcopamā /
GK16vcamkc_u:2523: śabdapradhānaṃ prakṛtaṃ vikṛtaṃ ceti tad dvidhā // Ckc_8.19 //
GK16vcamkc_u:2529: atra sādṛśyādi vivakṣāyāmabhedopacāreṇopameyasya karavālasya payomugiva payomugiti
GK16vcamkc_u:2533: śrīsiṅgakṣitināyakasya yaśasāṃ candreṇa sāndrā ruciḥ yatprāptā tapanaṃ pratāmapabhito loke tadatyadbhutam /
GK16vcamkc_u:2534: evaṃ nāticamatkṛtaṃ tadanayoratyantamāśliṣyator āpatyātithayo bhavanti yadamī pratyarthipṛthvībhūjaḥ // Ckc_8.*24 //
GK16vcamkc_u:2535: atra yaśaso candreṇa pratāpaṃ tapanamiti dvayorupamānayorupameyaśabdasāmānādhikaraṇyādupamānārthastirohitaḥ samāsaśca kṛta iti samastaṃ nāma prakṛtaśabdapradhānaṃrūpakam /
GK16vcamkc_u:2539: atra bhujābhujaṅgamasya samastatvaṃ daṃṣṭretyasamastamiti tadidamubhayaṃ nāma prakṛtiśabdapradhānaṃ rūpakam /
GK16vcamkc_u:2543: atra nāyakamandarakṣubhitaviśeṣaṇamiva viśiṣṭaireva vāhinīnāthavairivāhinyo rūpaṇamiti saviśeṣaṇaṃ nāmedaṃ prakṛtiśabdapradhānarūpakam /
GK16vcamkc_u:2554: vilasati kaṭākṣarekhā tava siṅgakṣitipa kalpavṛkṣasurekhā // Ckc_8.*28 //
GK16vcamkc_u:2558: rāja kumāra dviradairdviradaṃ śilābhiśśilā śikhā saudhaiḥ /
GK16vcamkc_u:2560: atra rājakumāradviradādīnāṃ rūpakāṇāṃ raśanā nyāyāduttarottarasaṃkalanyā rūpitatvādiyaṃ mekhalā nāma vikṛtaśabdapradhānaṃ rūpakam /
GK16vcamkc_u:2564: cūḍāratnaṃ nṛpaṣariṣadāmarthināṃ pārijāto rakṣālāsaḥ sucaritavatāṃ bhāgyarāśernidhānam /
GK16vcamkc_u:2566: galā durnayānāṃ siṅgakṣoṇītalapatirayaṃ rājate rājaśaile // Ckc_8.*30 //
GK16vcamkc_u:2567: atra ekasminnava nāyake mālikāprakāreṇa rūpakāṇāṃ nirūpaṇādidaṃ mālikā nāma vikṛtaśabda pradhānaṃ rupakam /
GK16vcamkc_u:2571: atra vallītvenāropitasya kṛpāṇasya bhujagatayā rūpaṇādidaṃ rūpakarūpakaṃ nāma vikṛtaśabdapradhānarūpakam /
GK16vcamkc_u:2578: śrīsiṅgabhūpa bhavadīyamukhāravinda- madhyāsyate kamalayā paramādareṇa // Ckc_8.*32 //
GK16vcamkc_u:2581: prādhānyamiti ca tadidaṃ sakalaṃ nāmāṅgipradhānamarthapradhānaṃ rupakam /
GK16vcamkc_u:2585: atra smitajyotsnayoravayavayoḥ nirūpaṇaṃ nirūpyāvayavena pūrṇendulakṣaṇasyopamānasyānabhidhānāt tadidaṃ vikalaṃ nāmāṅgipradhānaṃ rūpakam /
GK16vcamkc_u:2589: atra yadyapi padmākara iti gauṇavṛttirvyapāśrayata iti śadba eva viśeṣaṇairalaṅkiyate
GK16vcamkc_u:2590: tathāpi padmāyā ākara iti śleṣasāmarthyena mukhyasyeva bhavati śadbhārthasya prādhānyamavagamyata
GK16vcamkc_u:2593: kīrtyamṛtaṃ śuci dadhatī dhārāgaralena vidadhatī bhītim /
GK16vcamkc_u:2595: atrāropyamāṇayoḥ sudhāgaralayoḥ svabhāva viruddhatvena parasparasaṃgatyayogatvādayukttaṃ nāmāṅgipradhānaṃ rupakam /
GK16vcamkc_u:2600: sāmantakṣitipairupāyanatayā sevāturairarpitāḥ śrīsiṅgakṣitipālamādaramayaṃ kurvanti kanyālatāḥ // Ckc_8.*36 //
GK16vcamkc_u:2601: atra kanyāpakṣe payodhara mandasmitabhujādaralakṣaṇānāṃ latāpakṣe mañjarīprasūnadvirephapatrlavarūpāṇāṃ cāvayavānāṃ nāyakotsukīkaraṇe prādhānyamiti sahajāṅgapradhānarūpakamidam /
GK16vcamkc_u:2606: cāvayavatayā kalpitatvādāhāryāṇāṃ saṃnahane prādhānyamityāhāryāṅgapradhānaṃ rūpakamitīdamubhaya prādhānyam /
GK16vcamkc_u:2612: sahajānāṃ cāvayavānāṃ rupakāṇāṃ vairirājanyakṣobhakaraṇe prādhānyamiti sahajāhāryāṅgapradhānaṃ rūpakamidam /
GK16vcamkc_u:2616: atra bhujāvayavino bhujagatayā rūpaṇe kṛte tadavayavānāmaṅgulīnāṃ patrlavatārūpayā
GK16vcamkc_u:2617: rūpaṇayā padāntarāṇāṃ skandhaśubharekhāṇāṃ rūpaṇaṃ ceti sarvato vaiṣamyāt tāmrāṅgutryādīnāṃ
GK16vcamkc_u:2618: bhāgyadvārā dharaṇībharaṇasthairye prādhānyācca tadidaṃ viṣamāṅgapradhānaṃ rūpakam /
GK16vcamkc_u:2619: dvidhā śabhdārthamukhyassyāt kevalaṃ vyatireki ca // Ckc_8.24 //
GK16vcamkc_u:2623: atra nāyakāvayavinaḥ kuvalayasya candratayā rūpaṇena śabdaprādhānyamuktaśliṣṭaviśeṣaṇa viśeṣādarthasya prādhānyamiti kevalā nāmedamubhayapradhānaṃ rūpakam /
GK16vcamkc_u:2625: abhaṅgo vārāśiḥ vigalitakalaṅko himarucir vivekī hemādriḥ kalitanijamūrtī ratipatiḥ /
GK16vcamkc_u:2626: anindyo devendraḥ kuṭilagatihīno bhujagarāḍ janānāṃ bhāgyena kṣitimavati siṅgakṣitipatiḥ // Ckc_8.*41 //
GK16vcamkc_u:2627: atra vārāśiprabhṛtīnāmabhaṅgādiviśeṣaṇāṅkuritavyatirekāṇāṃ nāyakasāmānādhikaraṇyena kathanādarthata śśabdataḥ prādhānyamavadhāryata iti vyatirekavannāmobhayapradhānaṃ rūpakam /
GK16vcamkc_u:2638: svaraṃ vīṇākvāṇairlalitamupadhā vārasudṛśāṃ jigīṣā yātrāyāṃ bharitadiśi siṅgakṣitipatiḥ // Ckc_8.*42 //
GK16vcamkc_u:2644: mimīte mattebhaiḥ kulagirikulaṃ tuṅgaśikharaṃ phalāni drākṣāṇāṃ vacanaparipākaiḥ kṛtadhiyām /
GK16vcamkc_u:2645: vipañcīnikvāṇaṃ śrutibhirupadhā vārasudṛsāṃ jigoṣā yātrāyāṃ bharitadiśi siṅgakṣitipatiḥ // Ckc_8.*43 //
GK16vcamkc_u:2646: atra kulaśailādīnāmupameyatvaṃ mattebhānāmupamānatvaṃ ca prasiddhavaiparīṃtyena kalpitamiti seyaṃ vikṛtaprapañcoktirnāma sāmyabhedaḥ /
GK16vcamkc_u:2648: mā garvīyata medini sumanaso recarlavaṃśāgraṇīḥ śrīsiṅgakṣitipālako vitaraṇairmuṣṇāti tṛṣṇāmiti /
GK16vcamkc_u:2650: atra bhobho viśvaṃbharāmarāḥ kimanenaiva vitaraṇaśālinā nāyakena garvāyadhve /
GK16vcamkc_u:2651: diviṣadāṃ punaranekasantatikalpavṛkṣādayo dātāra ityupamānotkarṣādiyamutkarṣavatī prapañcoktirnāma sāmyabhaktiḥ /
GK16vcamkc_u:2653: kurvanmārjitamambare jalanidhau saṃkṣālayan gharṣayan dehaṃ meruśilāsu candraki javaṃ nakttaṃ divaṃ bhrāmyase /
GK16vcamkc_u:2654: kiṃ kṛtvā hṛdi siṅgabhūpatiyaśo rājāsi kiṃ bhrūmahe satyaṃ śakyamapohituṃ nahi nahi svābhāvikī śyāmikā // Ckc_8.*45 //
GK16vcamkc_u:2662: atra kevalanivartanādikriyāyogajanitaṃ sāmyaṃ vā dṛṣṭāntapūrvamiti seyaṃ kevalakriyāyogavatī dṛṣṭāntoktiḥ /
GK16vcamkc_u:2663: miśrakriyāyogavatī saiva yathā atraiva dvitīyapādasthāne kṛtaprasādāṃ racitaprasādetipāṭhe nivartanakriyā prasādaguṇanimittasāmyā miśrakriyāyogavatīyaṃ dṛṣṭāntoktiḥ /
GK16vcamkc_u:2665: nanu dṛṣṭāntoktteḥ dṛṣṭāntālaṅkārasya vā ko viśeṣaḥ /
GK16vcamkc_u:2667: laukikaparīkṣakāṇāṃ yasminnarthe bṛddhisāmyaṃ sa dṛṣṭānta ityarthaṃ prati na kaścidbhedaḥ /
GK16vcamkc_u:2677: mattebhāsurabhāsurājinapaṭe sphūrjatkaṭe dhūrjaṭe- rāśaṅkyeta yataḥ kutaścana mṛge nyakkāraḍhakkāravaḥ /
GK16vcamkc_u:2678: yadyanyairanavadyapadyayaśasaḥ śrīsiṅgabhūśārṅiṇo bhūpālairabhilakṣyate raṇamukhe bhrūbhaṅgabhīmaṃ mukham // Ckc_8.*47 //
GK16vcamkc_u:2680: dārṣṭāntikaṃ prativastu paścāditi dṛṭāntoktichāyāvatīyaṃ prativastūktirnāma sāmyabhaktiḥ /
GK16vcamkc_u:2682: śrīsiṅgakṣitipāśrayā yadi kathā merorna me rocate tadvaktrasya vilokanaṃ yadi vṛthā candrasya saṃdarśanam /
GK16vcamkc_u:2683: tadgoṣṭhī yadi pṛṣṭhato na viśate sā mādhavī mādhurī tatsevā yadi siddhameva sudhiyāmavyājabhavyārjanam // Ckc_8.*48 //
GK16vcamkc_u:2684: atropamānāpakarṣastriṣvartheṣu caturthe tu samatvamiti prapañcoktichāyāvatī prativastūktiḥ /
GK16vcamkc_u:2692: śākāhāraparigraho giridarīṣvekāntacintā ratiḥ śayyā sthaṇḍila eva bhūtidhavalā mūrtirjaṭālaṃ śiraḥ /
GK16vcamkc_u:2693: aṅgānyasthimayāni hanta sutarāṃ kiṃ vā tapasvī bhavā- nuddaṇḍapratigaṇḍabhairavavibhoḥ kiṃ vā virodhī nṛpaḥ // Ckc_8.*49 //
GK16vcamkc_u:2697: dvau netrānandakandau jagati kuvalayaprīṇane jāgarūkau sanmārgaikapradārapravaṇanijamatī pūryamāṇau kalābhiḥ /
GK16vcamkc_u:2698: tatkovā siṅgapṛthvītilakaḥ konu rākāmṛgāṅkaḥ kā jyotsnā kā ca kīrtiściramati vimṛśan naiva nājāmi tattvam // Ckc_8.*50 //
GK16vcamkc_u:2700: iyaṃ pratīta sāmyāpi saṃbhavati yathā atraiva kā ñcotsnā kā ca kīrtiriti jyotsnāpratīta dhāvalyādisāmyayoḥ pratyekamubhayamāśaṅkyata iti seyaṃ pratīta varṇanasāmyānekaviṣayā /
GK16vcamkc_u:2708: tathā hi saṃdihāno vitarkakoṭimāruhya tarkakakṣyāṃ parityajya tattvamevābhiniviśate /
GK16vcamkc_u:2710: anyasya vastuno nyāso yatra sāpaṅnutirmatā // Ckc_8.35 //
GK16vcamkc_u:2712: neyaṃ śāradakaumudī sakhi yaśaḥ śrīsiṅgapṛthvīpateḥ naitaccañcalacañcarīkapaṭalaṃ taddveṣiṇāṃ duryaśaḥ /
GK16vcamkc_u:2713: nedaṃ kokilakūjitaṃ mṛgadṛśāṃ tatkīrtisaṃgītami- tyālāpānanusaṃdadhāti sudṛśo dūrapriyāyāḥ sakhi // Ckc_8.*51 //
GK16vcamkc_u:2718: netraṃ hanta vataṃsaguccharajasā bāṣpāyate dūṣitaṃ gātraṃ spṛṭamanena mandamarutā romāñcamālaṃbate /
GK16vcamkc_u:2719: nānyatkāraṇamityudīritavatī kāciddhṛdīcchāgate śrīsiṅgakṣitipālake nijasakhī mandasmitairlajjate // Ckc_8.*52 //
GK16vcamkc_u:2721: cajidānaṃdabāṣparomāñcakāraṇaṃ nāyakaviṣayamanurāgamapahnutya visadṛśavirāgapavanalakṣaṇakāraṇopanyāsaḥ kalpita iti seyamasādṛśyavatī nāmāpahnutiḥ
GK16vcamkc_u:2723: anyasyānyadharmasya tadubhayasya ceti vyutpattyā dharmiṇoradhyāse dharmasyādhyāse dharmadharmiṇoradhyāse ca trividhaḥ samādhiḥ /
GK16vcamkc_u:2725: pakṣāṇāṃ kurute sa tatkṣaṇamayaṃ yutpakṣarakṣāmaṇiḥ durgāpāśrayaṇaṃ tvabhīrumanasornaivāsya saṃbhāvyate /
GK16vcamkc_u:2726: itthaṃ cintayatāmiva kṣitijaye śrīsiṅgapṛthvīpate tvayyāsannacare kulakṣitibhṛtāṃ labghodayā stabdhatā // Ckc_8.*53 //
GK16vcamkc_u:2727: atra pakṣaparirakṣaṇādi dharmāropamapahāya nāyake taddharmavataḥ parvataśāsanasyaivādhyāsādayaṃ dharmisamādhiḥ /
GK16vcamkc_u:2729: śrīsiṅgabhūpāla tava pratāpe jitvā pradīpte tapanapratāpam /
GK16vcamkc_u:2735: prāk saṃbhūta bhiyābhibhūtaraśanāpṛṣṭhe kṛtāhaṃ kitāṃ daṃṣṭrāgreṇa vikampitā paraśatairākramya nītāṃghriṇā /
GK16vcamkc_u:2737: raicarlīyakulodbhavena bhavatā seyaṃ sthirā manyate // Ckc_8.*55 //
GK16vcamkc_u:2738: atra nāyake nārāyaṇasya dharmiṇāṃ taddhardhāṇāṃ matsyādibalabhadrāntāvatārakalpitānāṃ jaldhisaṃkṣobhaṇā diraśanāsamāropaṇādayamubhayasamādhiḥ
GK16vcamkc_u:2741: ślāghāṃ garhāmupālaṃbhaṃ prāpteyaṃ trividhā bhavet // Ckc_8.38 //
GK16vcamkc_u:2747: ślāghā pratīyata iti seyaṃ ślāghāvatī samāsoktiḥ /
GK16vcamkc_u:2749: ekā daityagurorubhe murabhidastisraḥ paśūnāṃ prabhor aṣṭau dvādaśa padmagarbhaguhayorlaṅkāpaterviśatiḥ /
GK16vcamkc_u:2750: asmākaṃ tu dṛśaḥ sahasramiti mā garvīya vāstoṣpate mākrodhītarāgatismaraṇatokta lajjā nu ...... tebhavet (?) // Ckc_8.*57 //
GK16vcamkc_u:2756: api mṛdulairapi pravālairapi kusumairapi tiktatāṃ viditvā /
GK16vcamkc_u:2757: upavasasi sakhe palāśayā kiṃ pariṇatavānapi tikta eva nimbaḥ // Ckc_8.*58 //
GK16vcamkc_u:2758: atra tiktatā mūrdhābhiṣikttena nijenaivopamānena pratīyamānasādṛsyasyaiva niṣkamparase
GK16vcamkc_u:2762: dhṛterādhārasya sphuṭaraṭita śuddhaiḥ kṛtamudā sarasvatyā nityaṃ prakaṭitasuvahṇaprasarayā /
GK16vcamkc_u:2763: sudharmātambānāmiha sumanasāmekavasate- ssuvarṇādreḥ kṣoṇībharaṇamucitaṃ netaragireḥ // Ckc_8.*59 //
GK16vcamkc_u:2764: atra suvarṇagiriṇaivopamānena dhṛtyādhāratvādibhirabhidhīyamānasādṛśyasya siṅgabhūpālasyopameyasyoktisiddhāvupamānamukhādivopameyasya ślāghā pratīyata iti seyaṃ yathoktā /
GK16vcamkc_u:2767: itthaṃ viddhamupāsya tairthikajana grāsādudagrātmane māyāmāṃsalaśiṃśumāra bhavate dūreṇa baddhāñjaliḥ // Ckc_8.*60 //
GK16vcamkc_u:2772: jātaśriyo himakarasphuraṇeddhakānter jāḍyaṃ na cediha tulāmupayāti ko 'nyaḥ // Ckc_8.*61 //
GK16vcamkc_u:2773: atrāṃbudherevopamānasyopālaṃbhāt tadupameyasyābhidhīyamānasādṛśyasya kasyacidguṇavato 'pi vilambakāriṇe upālaṃbhaḥ pratīyata iti seyamabhidhīyamānasādṛśyopālaṃbhavatī samāsoktiḥ /
GK16vcamkc_u:2776: vārādhārāḥ kati na suvate duryaśorāśihetor antarjantuvyatikaravasālaṃbitān kṣudraśaṃkhān /
GK16vcamkc_u:2777: so 'yaṃ bhūmnāmāvādharudadhiryatra bhāgyāvadhīnāṃ saubhāgyānāṃ janiruditavān dakṣiṇāvartaśaṅkhaḥ // Ckc_8.*62 //
GK16vcamkc_u:2782: nāyakāva taramapariṇatabhāgadheyasya recarlavaṃśasyoktisiddhā vupamānamukhenaivopameyasya ślāghā pratīyate /
GK16vcamkc_u:2788: kareṇa pālayan lokān bhāsate siṅgabhūpatiḥ // Ckc_8.*63 //
GK16vcamkc_u:2789: atra varṇanīyasya nāyakasya samucitāyā mupameyatāyāṃ viparyāsopamānyāyenopamānīkṛtasya
GK16vcamkc_u:2790: ślāghāyā viśeṣeṇa balābhidhīyamāna sāmānyaśatamanyoḥ pratītaślāghe pratīte iti seyaṃ
GK16vcamkc_u:2796: upameye upamānāropaṇaṃ samādhiḥ upamāne upameyadharmādhyāsaḥ samāsoktiḥ iti vyakta evānayorbhedaḥ /
GK16vcamkc_u:2802: nārhasthitiśca suraveśmani sarvadeti citte vicintya payasāmadhipaṃ vihāya /
GK16vcamkc_u:2803: recarlavaṃśamavatīrṇa ivācyuto 'yaṃ śrīsiṅgabhūpatiridaṃ paripāti viśvam // Ckc_8.*64 //
GK16vcamkc_u:2804: atra nāyakasya recarlavaṃśānatīrṇalakṣmīnāyakarūpeṇa saṃbhāvanamiti seyaṃ dravyasvarūpetprekṣā /
GK16vcamkc_u:2807: bṛndārakopanasīmni himācalārthaṃ śrīsiṅgabhūpatiyaśo viśati trilokam // Ckc_8.*65 //
GK16vcamkc_u:2808: atra kīrteḥ trilokapraveśasya prayojanatayā dvitīyabhujageśvarādidravyāṇāṃ kathanādiyaṃ tathoktā /
GK16vcamkc_u:2811: śrīsiṅgabhūmipatinā racitapratiṣṭhā prīṇāṃti bhūmirapareṇa sumerūṇeva // Ckc_8.*66 //
GK16vcamkc_u:2815: kallolitā iva kaṭākṣavilāsabhaṅgyo mandasmitaiḥ kusumitā ivasāpadeśaiḥ // Ckc_8.*67 //
GK16vcamkc_u:2816: atra nāyakaviṣayāṇāṃ taruṇījanānurāgāṇāṃ kallolitādirūpeṇa saṃbhāvanaṃ kṛtamiti seyaṃ tathoktā /
GK16vcamkc_u:2820: atra sāhityacāturyasya mūrtimadānandatayā saṃbhāvanaṃ kṛtamiti seyaṃ tathoktā /
GK16vcamkc_u:2824: atra spardhāyā guṇatvaṃ hetutvaṃ ceti seyaṃ tathoktā /
GK16vcamkc_u:2827: śrīsiṅgabhūpatiyaśo viśadaṃ trilokaṃ sraṣṭuḥ sabhāmanunayārthamiva prayāti // Ckc_8.*70 //
GK16vcamkc_u:2828: atrānunayasya guṇatvam phalatvaṃ ceti seyaṃ tathoktā /
GK16vcamkc_u:2830: śrīsiṅgabhūtalapateḥ śritapārijāta- saṃjñāṅkitasya yaśasā mahatā parītaḥ /
GK16vcamkc_u:2832: atra kalpavṛkṣasya nāyakakīrtyā yadāvaraṇaṃ tatpayodhimajjavarūpeṇa saṃbhāvitamiti seyaṃ tathoktā /
GK16vcamkc_u:2835: antassaṃtāpabādhāṃ śamayitumiva tāṃ siṅgabhūpālakīrti- jyotsnā kṛtsrātiśītā praviśati kuharaṃ mandarīṇāṃ darīṇām // Ckc_8.*72 //
GK16vcamkc_u:2839: āmūlavellitalatāvalayāpadeśā- tkalpadrumā nigalitāḥ prabhuṇā prajānām // Ckc_8.*73 //
GK16vcamkc_u:2846: dhanyāste girayo jayanti yadamī śrīsiṅgapṛthvīpater- yātavyā nahibhūbhṛto 'pyalamayaṃ rājāpi candrassakhī /
GK16vcamkc_u:2847: tatra śrībharitānyapi kṣitiruhāṃ bṛndāni bhāgyādhikā- nyuddaṇḍīkṛtapuṇḍarīkamahimāpyekaṃ kṛtārtha saraḥ // Ckc_8.*74 //
GK16vcamkc_u:2848: atrāpi jigīṣornāyakasya yātavyapakṣasthitermūrdhābhiṣikttairātmanindāyāṃ prastutāyāmaprastutānāṃ giricandrasarasāṃ praśaṃsanaṃ vihitamiti seyamaprastutapraśaṃsā
GK16vcamkc_u:2850: yatsamīkṛtya kathanaṃ sā matā tulyayogitā // Ckc_8.44 //
GK16vcamkc_u:2852: rādheyaṃ rajanīkaraṃ ratipatiṃ ratnākaraṃ rāghavam ratnaṃ vaidharaṇīdharaṃ rasanidhiṃ rantiṃ rasālaṃ ravim /
GK16vcamkc_u:2853: raicarlīyakulodvahaṃ ca sṛjatā lokopakārakriyā- hetorlokapitāmahena karuṇāsarvasvamāviṣkṛtam // Ckc_8.*75 //
GK16vcamkc_u:2854: atra lokopakāraparāyaṇatvalabdhastutīnāṃ karṇādīnāṃ tulyayogena nāyakastutervihitatvādiyaṃ stutyarthā tulyayogitā /
GK16vcamkc_u:2857: śrīsiṅgabhūparaṇaṇānyanapāśrayācca vāñchanti jīvitamaho viṣamā manuṣyāḥ // Ckc_8.*76 //
GK16vcamkc_u:2858: atra kevalavadhūpātānapariṇāmatvena labhdagarhāṇāṃ dhātuvādādīnāṃ tulyakakṣyānikṣepānnāyaketararājāśrayaṇasya sāmyaṃ nindārthaṃ pratīyata iti seyaṃ tathoktā /
GK16vcamkc_u:2859: doṣasya yo guṇībhāvo doṣībhāvo guṇasya yaḥ /
GK16vcamkc_u:2863: tvāmārādhayatāṃ yaśodhananidhe śrīsiṅgapṛthvīpate sākṣāt sevitumicchato 'vanipatīn manyasva mānyottamān // Ckc_8.*77 //
GK16vcamkc_u:2865: nāyakasya manasi doṣatayā pratibhāsyata ityabhiprāyeṇa caturamatibhiramātyaiḥ pramukhanaiṣṭhuryaparijihīrṣayā
GK16vcamkc_u:2867: iti so 'yaṃ doṣasya guṇībhāvo nāma leśataḥ śanairananyaviditamucyata iti leśaḥ /
GK16vcamkc_u:2869: etāvtyapi vipriye priyasakhi prāṇeṣu kā prārthanā kiṃ vā tena śaṭhena nirdayahṛdā recarlavaṃśendunā /
GK16vcamkc_u:2870: yasyāgaḥ parimārjanāya kṛtināmagresarasya sphuṭaṃ sāmnāṃ sāradhumādhure sahabhuvāṃ śikṣeva nityavratam // Ckc_8.*78 //
GK16vcamkc_u:2871: atra kācidanatidhīrā nāyakā mānāgraha parigrahānuguṇamarthaṃ sakhīnāyakāgrataḥ pratijñāya
GK16vcamkc_u:2873: nāyakaguṇagrāmaṃ doṣībhāvena samupanyasyatīti so 'yaṃ guṇasya doṣībhāvo nāma leśaḥ /
GK16vcamkc_u:2875: chāyāpahāre racite 'ravindaiḥ śrīsiṅgabhūpāla na modase tvam /
GK16vcamkc_u:2876: chāyāpahāreṇa sahādirāja- ślokāpahāraṃ kuruṣe kimetat // Ckc_8.*79 //
GK16vcamkc_u:2877: atra rājakīrtyapahāralakṣaṇasya nāyakaguṇasya śabdaśaktyā camatkārāya doṣatayā kathanād vyājastutirapi sa eva /
GK16vcamkc_u:2883: atra śatrulakṣakatvapadārtho visadṛśaiḥ nāyaka kīrtivistāraiḥ kathitā pratītasādṛśyaiḥ saha deśāntaradhāvanakriyāyāṃ samāviṣṭa iti seyaṃ tathoktā
GK16vcamkc_u:2885: kṣoṇībhṛtkaṭakoparodhanapaṭuḥ vyāpārabhavyodayā- māśāpūraṇa kāraṇaśriyamiva prāpnoti kīrtiśriyam /
GK16vcamkc_u:2886: śrīsiṅgakṣitipālamaṇḍanamaṇe recarlavaṃśāgraṇī- rānandānanusandadhāti viduṣāṃ dravyaiḥ svakāvyairiva // Ckc_8.*81 //
GK16vcamkc_u:2887: atra śabdaśaktyābhidhīyamānasamānadharmayoḥ lakṣmīkīrtyoḥ sādṛśyapratīyamānaspṛhaṇīyatvādinā dharmayoḥ dravyakāvyāyośva sādṛsyamivena dyotyate
GK16vcamkc_u:2892: iha tu dvayossamaprādhānyena karmakaraṇabhāvādivivakṣāyāṃ prāptyānandā nusaṃdhānādikriyāsamāveśa iti śleṣodbhāvitopamānachāyā itīyaṃ sādṛśyavatī samāsoktiḥ /
GK16vcamkc_u:2893: evaṃ viviktādi bhedena kartrādīnāṃ prāyopamānānāṃ bhedāssvayamupagantavyāḥ /
GK16vcamkc_u:2901: śrīsiṅgabhūpāla bhuvi tbadīyā mūrtiśva kīrtiśva mudaṃ tanoti // Ckc_8.*82 //
GK16vcamkc_u:2902: atra mūrtiḥ kīrtiriti dve vastunī pratipadaṃ dyotakena cakāreṇa ekasyāṃ tanotīti kriyāyāṃ samuccitya niveśite /
GK16vcamkc_u:2903: tena tanuta iti dvivacanaṃ cārthe dvandvasamāsaśva bhavatīti so 'yaṃ kriyāyāṃ dravyasamuccayo nāma pratipadadyotako dvipadāśrayassamuccayabhedaḥ
GK16vcamkc_u:2906: jikīṣā saṃraṃbhastava sapadi siṅgakṣitipate vipakṣāṇāṃ lakṣṇī calayati samutkaṇṭhayati ca // Ckc_8.*83 //
GK16vcamkc_u:2907: atra calanotkaṇṭhālakṣaṇe dve vastunī uttarapadavartinā dyotakenaikasminneva vipakṣalakṣmīlakṣaṇe
GK16vcamkc_u:2908: dharmabhūte dvavye samuccayenaikakālameva niveśita iti so 'yamuttarapadagatadyotako
GK16vcamkc_u:2912: nyāyakramaśca bhujadaṇḍaparākramaśca kālajñatā ca karuṇā ca kṛtajñatā ca /
GK16vcamkc_u:2913: kāvyajñatā ca kavitā ca vadānyatā ca tvāṃ siṅgabhūpa......prapariṣkaroti // Ckc_8.*84 //
GK16vcamkc_u:2914: atra nyayaparākramādayaḥ pratipadāśrayadyotakenaikasyāṃ pariṣkaraṇakriyāyāṃ samuccayena niveśyante /
GK16vcamkc_u:2915: tena pariṣkurvantīti bahuvacanaṃ dvandvasamāsaśca na bhavitīti so 'yaṃ pratipadagatadyotakonāma bahupadāśrayasamuccayabhedaḥ /
GK16vcamkc_u:2916: so 'yaṃ ca kāraṇabāhulyena purāṇachāyāṃ smṛtipathamavatāraya nnātīva camatkārakārītyasmākaṃ matam /
GK16vcamkc_u:2922: samuccīyante na vyañjayantīti bahuvacanaṃ samāsaśca na bhavatīti so 'yamuttarapadagatadyotako
GK16vcamkc_u:2927: kāvyaṃ praśastaṃ tava kagīrtanaṃ ca satāṃ śriyāṃ sajjanarañjanaṃ ca // Ckc_8.*86 //
GK16vcamkc_u:2928: atra kāvyaṃ kīrtanaṃ ceti dve kriye /
GK16vcamkc_u:2930: evaṃ bahūnyapi vastūni dvandvaśa uttarapadavartinā dyotakenāvirāsīdityekasyāṃ kriyāyāṃ niveśyante /
GK16vcamkc_u:2931: tena santīti bahuvacanaṃ dvandvasamāsaśca na syāditi so 'yamubhyavargāśrayassamuccayaḥ /
GK16vcamkc_u:2937: atra nāyakaprabhānāyakau dve dravye paśyetyekasmin guṇapade yaditaretarayogena niveśite
GK16vcamkc_u:2938: taddvayorityatra tadviśeṣaṇayośca dvivacanavikṣāyāṃ samāsaśca bhavatīti so 'yaṃ tathokta
GK16vcamkc_u:2943: śrīsiṅgabhūmiramaṇe taruṇījanānāṃ bhāvasthitiṃ piśunayanti sakhījanāya // Ckc_8.*88 //
GK16vcamkc_u:2944: atrāvalokitaceṣṭāsmitamiti vastvanitaretarayogena taruṇījanānurāga nivedanakriyāyāṃ niveśyata iti so 'yamanubhayāśrayetaretarayogassamuccaya eva /
GK16vcamkc_u:2947: saundaryaṃ madane sukhaṃ surapatau bhāgyaṃ nidhīnāṃ prabhau kāruṇyaṃ raghunāyake caturimā cāṇūramalladviṣi /
GK16vcamkc_u:2948: dharmo dharmatanūbhave vitaraṇaṃ vidyādharādhīśvare tatsarvaṃ śritavatsale vilasati śrīsiṅgabhūmīśvare // Ckc_8.*89 //
GK16vcamkc_u:2949: atra sarvaṃ tadityanena saundaryādīnāṃ samudāya evānusandhīyate /
GK16vcamkc_u:2951: sa ceha tadityekavacanāntena napuṃsakena ca kathyate /
GK16vcamkc_u:2953: dyotaka iti so 'yamunabhayāśrayaḥ samahāraḥ samuccaya eva /
GK16vcamkc_u:2959: sādhūnāṃ parirakṣaṇāya dharaṇīṃ jitvā bhajethāḥ śriyaṃ paṅktiñca pratiyāyināṃ punarapi sve sve pade sthāpitā // Ckc_8.*90 //
GK16vcamkc_u:2960: atra bhajethā iti nāyakakartṛkāṃ śrīkarmakatvena kriyāmupanyasya tatkartṛkameva pratipālanakarmasaṃsthāpanakriyāṃ
GK16vcamkc_u:2961: tva nvācayena niveśitamiti so 'yamanvācayo 'pi samuccayabheda eva /
GK16vcamkc_u:2964: kāntārakṣitivāsakhinnamanasā kānta tvayā sevituṃ śrīsiṅgakṣitināthamandhranagarī gamyeti ced gamyatām /
GK16vcamkc_u:2967: yaṃ deśaṃ pradadhāti te sukṛtadhīstatraiva janmāstu me // Ckc_8.*91 //
GK16vcamkc_u:2968: atra gamyatāmiti kathitasya vidhivākyasyaivānukūlayaiva janmāntarāśiṣā maraṇasūcanāniṣedhaḥ kriyata iti so 'yaṃ vidhyākṣepaḥ /
GK16vcamkc_u:2970: na hi vayaṃ kavayaḥ kavayastu ye nagariguṇānasato 'pi vivṛṇvate /
GK16vcamkc_u:2971: nigadituṃ na hi siṅgavasundharābhuji santo 'pi guṇānvayamīśmahe // Ckc_8.*92 //
GK16vcamkc_u:2972: atra neśmahe iti niṣedhena kavitvalakṣaṇasyāropitaguṇavarṇanasya niṣedhaḥ dharmata iti so 'yaṃ vidhyākṣepaḥ (niṣedhākṣepaḥ?) /
GK16vcamkc_u:2976: siṅgakṣoṇīramaṇasaraṇiṃ mānamunmānadhītvaṃ yadyad dravyaṃ karayasi paraṃ pratyahopārjanena /
GK16vcamkc_u:2977: tattatpātre nihitamasakṛdvismarasyeva citte kāryasyānte ka iva hi bhavet kāṅkṣaṇā yaḥ prabhūṇām // Ckc_8.*93 //
GK16vcamkc_u:2978: atra nāyakasya pātradattadharmadravyānanuśocanalakṣaṇaṃ vastu prastutya tatsādhanasamarthaṃprabhusvabhāvalakṣaṇaṃ vastvantaramupanyastamiti sāhasaṃ ṣaṅguṇaṃ hi /
GK16vcamkc_u:2983: na yānaṃ prasunaṃ na ca surabhaigandhi praharaṇaṃ na maurvī vācāṭī na ca dhanurayatnātimadhuram /
GK16vcamkc_u:2984: tathāpi śrīsiṅgakṣitipatirayaṃ cañcaladṛśāṃ vidhatte saṃmohaṃ manasi nitarāṃ manmatha iva // Ckc_8.*94 //
GK16vcamkc_u:2985: atra puṣparathādidravyāsaṃbhave 'pi nāyakena yadidaṃ mattakāśī cittasaṃmohanakaraṇaṃ tena rūpādiśaviśeṣakāraṇaṃ pratīyata iti seyaṃ pratīyamānaheturviśeṣoktiḥ
GK16vcamkc_u:2990: atrāśvastetyādiviśeṣaṇairmahī vahanakriyāyā ananyasādhāraṇalakṣaṇa upaskāra iti so 'yaṃ kriyāparikaraḥ /
GK16vcamkc_u:2995: dharaṇī kuśalaṃ gamitā hariṇā hariṇā hariṇā hariṇā hariṇā // Ckc_8.*96 //
GK16vcamkc_u:2996: atra hariṇā hariṇā ityādi śabdaikāvalyā vibhinnārthayā nāyakalakṣaṇaṃ kartṛkārakamupaskriyata iti so 'yaṃ śabdaikāvalī kārakaparikarabheda eva
GK16vcamkc_u:3002: ārūḍhāni yaśāṃsi tetribhuvanaṃ śrīsiṅgapṛthvīpate gotragrāvamahāguhāḥ kṣitibhujāṃ bṛndāni mandaujasām /
GK16vcamkc_u:3003: tallakṣmīlalitāni lālitagirāṃ vidvajjanānāṃ gṛhān tadvākyāni ca tāvastutikathāślokyāni karṇau satām // Ckc_8.*97 //
GK16vcamkc_u:3004: atra kriyāvācinā gūḍhānītīvapadena prathamapādādivartinā sarvavākyāni dīpyanta iti tadidamādidīpakam /
GK16vcamkc_u:3008: dīvyanti divyavanitāsmitacandrikābhiḥ śrīsiṅgabhūpa tava kīrtivilāsacandrāḥ // Ckc_8.*98 //
GK16vcamkc_u:3009: atra krīḍārtha eva pādādikriyāsvāvartamānaḥ sarvavākyāni dīpayatīti seyamarthāvṛttirapi dīpakameva /
GK16vcamkc_u:3013: tatra prajāsantoṣaḥ kairavaścetyarthayorāvartamānaṃ kumudamiti padaṃ dve vā dīpayati padāvṛttirapi dīpakameva /
GK16vcamkc_u:3015: yathātraiva rājetyarthaḥ śabdaścāvartamānavākyadvayamuttejayata iti seyamubhayāvṛttirapi dīpakameva /
GK16vcamkc_u:3017: kīrtiḥ krīḍati siṅgabhūpa talapaterniryatnaratnāṅkuraṃ pātālo phaṇilokapuṅgavaphaṇāprāsādamāseduṣī /
GK16vcamkc_u:3019: atra kriyākartṛkasaṃbandhapadāni prativākyāmāvṛttāni saṃpuṭatayā dīpayantīti saṃpuṭāvṛttirapi dīpakameva /
GK16vcamkc_u:3021: paripāṭhyā tu bhaṇanaṃ śabdasyārthasya vā kramaḥ // Ckc_8.55 //
GK16vcamkc_u:3026: atra samāsaparipatitānāṃ guṇānāñca krameṇa pratyekaṃ yojanamiti samastaśabdakramo 'yam /
GK16vcamkc_u:3030: atra pūrvādīnāṃ namaskārādīnāṃ samāsarahitādīnāṃ yathākramamananvayo vivakṣita iti so 'yamasamastaśabdakramaḥ /
GK16vcamkc_u:3031: samastāsamastaśabdakramarupa ubhayakramo yathā hariśvandro rakṣākaraṇarucisatyeṣviti pūrvodāhṛtam //
GK16vcamkc_u:3032: atra prathamatṛtīyayoḥ pādayoḥ samastānāṃ rakṣākaraṇādīnāñca guṇānāmasamaktānāṃ tadguṇakatāṃ
GK16vcamkc_u:3034: gāṅgeyagāṅgeyānāṃ ca kramasamanvayo na vivakṣita hati so 'yamubhayakramaḥ /
GK16vcamkc_u:3040: paśvārdhe paridhānatāṃ hi dadhate saṃvyānatāṃ vakṣasi prāyo mūdhnyavaguṭhanatvamadhare...dasāṃ vā stumaḥ // Ckc_8.*103 //
GK16vcamkc_u:3041: atra vardhamanāyāḥ nāyakakorteḥ pratināyakaśuddhāntakāntāśarīrapradeśeṣu kramasaṃkrāntyā yo 'yaṃ paridhānādaupamyalābhaḥ /
GK16vcamkc_u:3044: apāṃ śoṣoddhārā vipatanabhiyā haṃsagilanā- ttuṣāraissītārtī virahijanaśayyādikatayā /
GK16vcamkc_u:3045: vidhitvā sāpāyaṃ jalaruhakulaṃ tadvijahatī sthitiṃ dhatte siḍgakṣitipatirapāye tvayi ramā // Ckc_8.*104 //
GK16vcamkc_u:3046: atra jalaśoṣādīnāṃ jalajāpāyahetūnāṃ grīṣmādivasantāvadhi kālakrameṇa bhaṇanāt kālator'thakramo 'yam /
GK16vcamkc_u:3047: miṣato vākrapravṛttiryā sa paryāya itīryate // Ckc_8.56 //
GK16vcamkc_u:3049: hanta krośati śārikānavarataṃ mṛdhnāti līlāmṛgaḥ śrāntāḥ kelicaṇautikāra vikaṭairbāhye sthitā vallakī /
GK16vcamkc_u:3050: ityālāpini nirgate priyasakhīvarge navoḍhā priyā bhūpālena sakhījanānusaraṇaṃ sparśena vistāritā // Ckc_8.*105 //
GK16vcamkc_u:3051: atra rahobhaṅgabhīruṇā vidagdhasakhīvargeṇākrośanākarṇanādimiṣātsukhena nirgamopāyo 'bhihita iti so 'yaṃ paryāyaḥ /
GK16vcamkc_u:3052: evaṃ kāryamiṣataḥ kāraṇokte ravivakṣādayo 'sya bhedāḥ svayamunneyāḥ /
GK16vcamkc_u:3056: na hi dravyasya jātervā sākṣādatiśayaḥ vkacit // Ckc_8.58 //
GK16vcamkc_u:3058: rūkṣāhaṃkṛtayo na santi lalita bhedaṃ gatena bhruvau dṛkkoṇo 'pi na rāgameti hasitaṃ mandaṃ ca nāntarhitam /
GK16vcamkc_u:3059: dṛṣṭvāpi pratigarjatāṃ kṣitibhujāṃ saṃraṃbhagarbhaśriyā mūrtirdāruṇaceṣṭayāpyavikṛtā śrīsiṅgapṛṣvīpateḥ // Ckc_8.*106 //
GK16vcamkc_u:3060: atra mahāraṇasaṃhaṃbhe nāyakasya bhrūbhedādivikārābhāvakathanāddhairyaviśeṣo vivakṣita iti seyaṃ guṇātiśayoktiḥ /
GK16vcamkc_u:3062: śrīsiṅgabhūpa bhavatīyaparigraheṇa dharmāya yad balavate kavireṣa bhītaḥ /
GK16vcamkc_u:3063: tretādibandhumuṣitau tu dadhāti bhāgau tatte tulāṃ na dadhate prathame narendrāḥ // Ckc_8.*107 //
GK16vcamkc_u:3064: atra nāyakagatadharmaparipālanakriyāviśeṣo vivakṣita iti seyaṃ kriyātiśayokriḥ /
GK16vcamkc_u:3068: śrīsiṅgabhūpatiyasāṃsi nirūḍhasattvā- nullaṅghayanti viṣamānapi vāhinīśān // Ckc_8.*108 //
GK16vcamkc_u:3069: atra vāhinīśapadena samudrasāmantarājalakṣaṇamarthadvayaṃ tadviśeṣaṇe tu tadanukūlārthadvayaṃ ca śliṣṭamiti so 'yaṃ śleṣālaṅkāraḥ /
GK16vcamkc_u:3070: udbhedā yatra bhāvasya bāvanā seyamīritā // Ckc_8.60 //
GK16vcamkc_u:3073: ardhīkṛtālakakucāphaṇi kahkaṇena mudrā kṛtā smarajitā likhitena tanvyā // Ckc_8.*109 //
GK16vcamkc_u:3074: atra vidagdhayā kayāpi kāminyā priyayogyānāṃ puṣpāṇāṃ puṣpaśarapuṣpaṃdhayagandhavahābhimarśaḥ
GK16vcamkc_u:3082: śabdārthālaṅkārayoḥ śabdobhayālaṅkārayorarthobhayālaṅkārayośva saṅkara ubhayālaṅkāra eva svārthālaṅkāravaśāt saṅkarasyobhayāśritatvasiddheḥ saṃbhāvyamānatvāt /
GK16vcamkc_u:3086: atra sādhūnāmasaṃmatimasaṃbhāvanāṃ vindato 'labhyamānān sā dhvaṃsayati nāśayatīti sādhvasaṃmatividhvasi durjanatarjanamityarthaḥ /
GK16vcamkc_u:3087: tādṛśaṃ siṅgabhūpālasevanaṃ kṛtvā nijagṛhe svagṛhe sthitairbhūpairmatividhvaṃsi sādhvasamiti yojanā /
GK16vcamkc_u:3088: atra nijagṛhe nigṛhītamiti kriyāpadaṃ nijagṛha iti saptamyā gūḍhamiti kriyāgūḍhalakṣaṇo viṣayapadāvṛttiyamakalakṣaṇasva śabdālaṅkārau saṃkīrṇāviti kevalaśabdālaṅkārasaṅkaro 'yam /
GK16vcamkc_u:3091: kānane nagaravartino ripūna tatpure vipinavāsino mṛgān // Ckc_8.*111 //
GK16vcamkc_u:3097: atrevaśabdena sahārtha iva saṃbhāvamārtho 'pi dyotyata iti ekavācakānupraveśena sahokterutprekṣāyāśva saṅkaraḥ /
GK16vcamkc_u:3099: tvayā dīnāriṇā rājan kṛtā dīnāriṇo mama /
GK16vcamkc_u:3101: atra prathamārdhe dīnāriṇā dīnārīti dvitīyapādamadhyayamakasyottarārdhe samagrāmavatā kṛteti virodhābhāsasya dvayossaṃkaraḥ /
GK16vcamkc_u:3104: citraṃ janasya valayā valayā nitāntaṃ tāsāṃ sitāyatadṛśāmudare kare ca // Ckc_8.*114 //
GK16vcamkc_u:3106: avalayan acalayan kare valayaḥ kaṭakamavalayamiti kartṛkriyāpadayorekavacanabahuvacane
GK16vcamkc_u:3107: śliṣṭe iti vacanaśleṣasya tārābhirindurivetyupamāyāśva viveko dṛsyata iti śabdobhayālaṅkārasaṅkaro 'yam /
GK16vcamkc_u:3113: santrāsaudviṣatāṃ...pratidiśaṃ tvatkīrtirādhāyate tvatkītau paridhāvanaṃ pratipadaṃ gāyanti vairistriyaḥ /
GK16vcamkc_u:3114: glānirvairibahadhūlatāsu dharaṇī viśrāmyati tvadbhuje viśrāmo bhuvi siṅgabhūpatimaṇeṃ nidrāṃnti vairistriyaḥ // Ckc_8.*116 //
GK16vcamkc_u:3117: śrīsiḍgakṣoṇibhartre diśi diśi sumanomānasollāsa kartre sāndrāmindro vibhūtiṃ śuciratiśucitāṃ dharmarājo 'ti dharmam /
GK16vcamkc_u:3118: rakṣāṃ rakṣo 'dhināthaḥ kuṭilavighaṭanodyogicetaḥ pracetā vāyussaṃpūrṇamāyurdhanamapi dhanadaśśaṃṅkaraḥ śaṃ karotu // Ckc_8.*117 //
GK16vcamkc_u:3119: atra diśi diśīti sumomānaseti śaṅkaraḥ śaṃ kotviti rakṣāṃ rakṣo iti vat chekānuprāsasya sāndrāmidra ityādāvanuprāsasya sumanaśśleṣaḥ pratiśabdotthāpitena dikpāla rūpa...(madhyama?)
GK16vcamkc_u:3121: kramanāmnobhayālaṅkāreṇa saha saṃniveśaḥ prakāśata iti so 'yaṃ trividhālaṅkāra ...
GK16vcamkc_u:3137: iti sakalamapi kalyāṇam iti sarasasāhityacāturīdhurīṇaviśveśvarakavicandrapraṇītāyāṃ śrīsiṅgabhūpālakīrtisudhāsāra śītalāyāṃ camatkāracandrikāyāmaṣṭamo vilāsaḥ //
